Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
<Leader>
select
バーテンダー
notice
よっぱらい
酒場の主人
<Veigue>
<Mao>
<Eugene>
<Annie>
<Tytree>
<Hilda>
男の人
レジの女
酒場
ミナール酒場
ミナール・酒場
<speed:0><scale:190>3
Entry.Notes: Minigame countdown.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:190>2
Entry.Notes: Minigame countdown.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:190>1
Entry.Notes: Minigame countdown.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:190>START!!
Entry.Notes: Minigame countdown.

Entry.JapaneseText: ウイスキー
Entry.Notes: Drink type for the minigame.

Entry.JapaneseText: カクテル
Entry.Notes: Drink type for the minigame

Entry.JapaneseText: 生
Entry.Notes: Drink type for the minigame.

Entry.JapaneseText: 地酒
Entry.Notes: Drink type for the minigame.

Entry.JapaneseText: のんびり飲むか。
Entry.Notes: Client 1 - opening line 1.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヤケ酒だ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm here to drown my sorrows!
Entry.Notes: Client 1 - opening line 2.
Client 1 - line when ordering a drink. The tag is the name the drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: 遅せぇ！ ほか行って飲むから もういいぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: This is taking too long! I'm going to go get a drink somewhere else!
Entry.Notes: Client 1 - line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: お～い！ 店員さ～ん！
Entry.Notes: Client 1 - line when you quit the minigame.

Entry.JapaneseText: おうおう、待ちかねたぜ♪
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I can't wait to drink it♪
Entry.Notes: Client 1 - line when you give them their drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: おっと！ 頼んでないけどサービスかい、それ？
Entry.EnglishText: Oh! I didn't ask for this. Is it on the house?
Entry.Notes: Client 1 - line when you give them other client's drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: まったり飲むか。
Entry.Notes: Client 2 - opening line 1.

Entry.JapaneseText: 飲みまくるぞ！
Entry.Notes: Client 2 - opening line 2.
Client 2 - line when ordering a drink. The tag is the name the drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: 遅せぇ！ いつまで待たせんだよ！ もう帰っから、いらね～よ！
Entry.EnglishText: This is taking too long! How long do you plan to keep me waiting?! Well, I'm leaving, so you can keep the drink!
Entry.Notes: Client 2 - line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれ？ 店員さ～ん！
Entry.Notes: Client 2 - line when you quit the minigame.

Entry.JapaneseText: お、きたきた♪
Entry.Notes: Client 2 - line when you give them their drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: 頼んでないぞ？ でもいいや、もらおう！
Entry.EnglishText: I didn't ask for this? Oh well, I'll take it!
Entry.Notes: Client 2 - line when you give them other client's drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: ゆっくり飲むかのう。
Entry.Notes: Client 3 - opening line 1.

Entry.JapaneseText: 飲まなきゃやってられん！
Entry.EnglishText: I can't go without a drink!
Entry.Notes: Client 3 - opening line 2.
Client 3 - line when ordering a drink. The tag is the name the drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: 夜が明けてしまう！ もう結構じゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: Do you plan on keeping me all night?! I've had enough of this!
Entry.Notes: Client 3 - line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: むむ？ 店員さんや～い。
Entry.Notes: Client 3 - line when you quit the minigame.

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ。ありがとう。
Entry.Notes: Client 3 - line when you give them their drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: ただでくれるのかい？ すまないのう。
Entry.EnglishText: Are you giving this to me for free? Thank you.
Entry.Notes: Client 3 - line when you give them other client's drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: 落ちついて頂きましょうかねぇ。
Entry.Notes: Client 4 - opening line 1.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今日は飲みたい気分なの。
Entry.Notes: Client 4 - opening line 2.
Client 4 - line when ordering a drink. The tag is the name the drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつまで待てばいいのかしら？ もう結構です。失礼するわ！
Entry.EnglishText: How long are you going to keep me waiting? I'm tired of this. Now if you'll excuse me!
Entry.Notes: Client 4 - line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: あら？ 店員さん!?
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? Where did my server go?!
Entry.Notes: Client 4 - line when you quit the minigame.

Entry.JapaneseText: ご苦労さま。
Entry.Notes: Client 4 - line when you give them their drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、サービスかい？ ありがたく頂戴するよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, is this on the house? You have my thanks.
Entry.Notes: Client 4 - line when you give them other client's drink.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい……
Entry.Notes: Veigue's line to acknowledge the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: 間に合わなかったか。
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like I took too long.
Entry.Notes: Veigue's line when time runs out.
Veigue's line when tripping.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうぞ。
Entry.Notes: Veigue's line when giving the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: はーい♪
Entry.Notes: Mao's line to acknowledge the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれ？ もうダメなの!?
Entry.Notes: Mao's line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ！ こぼしちゃった。
Entry.Notes: Mao's line when tripping.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい。お待たせ♪
Entry.Notes: Mao's line when giving the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: かしこまりました。
Entry.Notes: Eugene's line to acknowledge the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: 遅すぎたか……
Entry.Notes: Eugene's line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: むっ！
Entry.Notes: Eugene's line when tripping.

Entry.JapaneseText: お待たせしました。
Entry.Notes: Eugene's line when giving the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: 少々、お待ちください！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll have it for you in a moment!
Entry.Notes: Annie's line to acknowledge the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……すみません。
Entry.Notes: Annie's line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ！ ……もう。
Entry.Notes: Annie's line when tripping.

Entry.JapaneseText: お待たせ致しました♪
Entry.Notes: Annie's line when giving the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: よろこんで！
Entry.Notes: Tytree's line to acknowledge the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっちまった！
Entry.Notes: Tytree's line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっちまった！
Entry.Notes: Tytree's line when tripping.

Entry.JapaneseText: ほい！ お待ちどおさん！
Entry.EnglishText: All right! Sorry I kept you waiting!
Entry.Notes: Tytree's line when giving the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかったわ。
Entry.Notes: Hilda's line to acknowledge the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: 難しいものね……
Entry.EnglishText: This is harder than it looks...
Entry.Notes: Hilda's line when time runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: 難しいものね……
Entry.EnglishText: This is harder than it looks...
Entry.Notes: Hilda's line when tripping.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうぞ。
Entry.Notes: Hilda's line when giving the order.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>リタイアしますか？ はい いいえ
ちゃんとやってくれたみたいだな。 あんたのおかげで、用事が済んだよ。 ありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like you did a good job. I was able to get what I needed done. Thank you.

Entry.JapaneseText: これがお礼だ、 受け取ってくれ。
<speed:0><Green><unk17:340880>ガルドを手に入れました。
<Green>『<item:20000016>』のレシピを入手しました。
また頼むぜ！
あっ…… 冷てぇじゃねーかよ！
服も汚してくれちゃってよー！ どーしてくれんの!?
Entry.EnglishText: And you soiled my clothes, too! Just what do you think you're doing?!

Entry.JapaneseText: だいたい近頃の若いもんは……
Entry.EnglishText: Why, young people these days, see...

Entry.JapaneseText: うぉっ……!!
何すんだよ！ 服が汚れちまったよ！ どーしてくれんだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing?! You've ruined my clothes! Just what is your problem?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まったく、 どうしようもねえバイトだな…… 酒を運ぶ時はもっと手首を ぎゅっと固定して……
Entry.EnglishText: Geez... You're a hopeless part timer, aren't you... You see, when you hold alcohol, you need to keep your wrist steady like so...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……人生長いんだ。 ほんとにイロイロあるのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...You've got a long life ahead of you. There is much to experience.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、お帰り。
このバイトさん、親切だね。 俺の話にずっと付き合ってくれたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: This part-timer is so nice. We've been talking for a while now.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、と……もうこんな時間か。
あい、お金。 んじゃ、ま、帰るわ。 また来るぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Here's your money. Well, I'm heading out. I'll be back some other time.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……人生って不思議なもんだぜ。 ほんとにイロイロあるな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Life truly is strange. There is much to experience.

Entry.JapaneseText: おっ、お帰り。
このバイト、親切だな。 俺の話にずっと 付き合ってくれたんだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: This part-timer is so nice. We've been talking for forever, it seems.

Entry.JapaneseText: おっと、そろそろ 行かなきゃなんねえな。
勘定はこれでいいな。 ごちそうさん、また来るぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: This should be enough. Well, I'll be back. Bye!

Entry.JapaneseText: 常連さんが怒って帰っていったぞ！ あんたを信用して店をまかせたのに！
Entry.EnglishText: You've made my regulars so mad they up and left! To think I left this establishment in your hands!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今回はもういいよ……
「客の相手」っていっても、 他のお客さんをほったらかしに してちゃダメだろ！
Entry.EnglishText: You can't waste your time chatting with one customer while leaving the others high and dry!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今回はもういいよ……
最近、軍から外出禁止の お達しがあったろう？
Entry.EnglishText: Haven't you heard that the military has instituted a curfew?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなもんだから、みんなこっそり 隠れて飲みに来ては、グチばかり……
Entry.EnglishText: That's why everyone snuck over here to drink and complain about it...

Entry.JapaneseText: その相手をするだけで、 俺はもうヘトヘトさ。 いいかげん休みたくてさ……
Entry.EnglishText: But I find those sorts of customers exhausting. Boy, would I like to take a break...

Entry.JapaneseText: 実は、嫁さんに買い物を 頼まれててさ…… でも仕事は抜けられないだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Actually, my wife asked me if I could go shopping...but I can't really get out of work, you know?

Entry.JapaneseText: 実は、洗濯物を取り込むのを 忘れててさ、今から家に帰らなきゃ ならないのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Actually, I have to go home because I forgot to bring the laundry in.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海の方ででっかい魚が 上がったって言うんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that there are large fish down by the ocean...

Entry.JapaneseText: 見に行きたいけど、 店を離れられないし……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd like to go see them, but I'm stuck here at work...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと家に帰って、 子供の面倒を見なきゃ いけなくってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I need to go home for a bit to take care of my kid.

Entry.JapaneseText: うちの息子が急に具合が 悪くなってさ、様子を見に 帰らなきゃいけなくなったんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: My son got sick suddenly, so I need to go home to see how he's doing...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと酒の在庫を切らしちゃって、 仕入れに行かなきゃならないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm running low on liquor, so I need to go out and fetch some more.

Entry.JapaneseText: 実は今、俺…… 誰かに呼ばれてるような気が…… するんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Actually, right now I feel someone...calling me...

Entry.JapaneseText: だから……店には いられないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: So I...have to leave the tavern...

Entry.JapaneseText: お昼時にお客さんいっぱいで、 もうヘトヘトさ。
Entry.EnglishText: All the customers we had around lunchtime really took it out of me...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと休憩を取りたいんだけど、 代わりがいないしなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd like to take a break, but there's no one to cover for me.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこへ、あんたが登場ってワケだ！ お礼ははずむから、 俺の代わりに仕事を してくれないか？
Entry.EnglishText: So that's where you come in! I'll give you a reward, so could you cover my shift for a bit?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> はい いいえ
ああ、あんたか。
そんなわけで、ちょうど 俺の代わりに仕事してくれる人を 探してたんだが…… やる気はあるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: So, I'm looking for someone to fill in for me for a bit... Are you feeling up to it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> はい いいえ
よう！ ちょうどいい ところに来てくれた。 また俺の代わりをしてくれないか？ ちゃんとお礼はするからさ！
Entry.EnglishText: Boy, am I glad to see you! Would you mind filling in for me? I'll make it worth your while!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> はい いいえ
そうか…… 気が変わったら、 いつでも声かけてくれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I see... Come see me if you change your mind.

Entry.JapaneseText: 仕事の説明が必要かい？
Entry.EnglishText: Would you like me to explain what you need to do?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> はい いいえ
俺がいない間の、 お客さんの相手を頼む。
Entry.EnglishText: Take care of the customers while I'm away.

Entry.JapaneseText: 厨房から、注文を受けた お客さんの席まで 酒を運んでくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Once you've received their order from the kitchen, you need to take it to the customer's table.

Entry.JapaneseText: ただし、走って運ぶとこぼれちまうし あんまり遅いとお客さんを怒らせちまうぞ。 急がず、素早く、確実にこなすんだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: The customers will get angry if you take too long, but if you run then you'll likely spill the drink. Don't rush it, but you need to go fast without messing up.

Entry.JapaneseText: あと、俺が戻るまで、 勝手に店から出て行ったり しないでくれよ！
Entry.EnglishText: And don't leave the store while I'm away!

Entry.JapaneseText: さぁ……お客さんのご来店だ。 俺が戻ってくるまで頼んだぜ。 「急がず、素早く、確実に」だぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well... Looks like we've got company. Take care of the customers while I'm gone. Remember: "Don't rush, don't mess up, but do it fast!"

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあな！
差し入れかい？ わるいねぇ。
Entry.EnglishText: A gift from a customer? Too bad.
Entry.Notes: Double check

Entry.JapaneseText: え、いや、違……
ハンバーグがあるけど、 食べていかないかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, wanna try out this Hamburger Steak?

Entry.JapaneseText: 普通の店のとはちょっと違う、 当店自慢のハンバーグだ。
Entry.EnglishText: This ain't your ordinary Hamburger Steak, this one here's the pride of this store!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>食べますか？ はい いいえ
<Green>『<item:2000000A>』を食べました。
うまい……
おいしい!! おいしいヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: This is so good! It's so dang tasty!

Entry.JapaneseText: これはうまいな……
おいしいですね♪
うめえぜ！ こいつぁ五つ星だ！
Entry.EnglishText: This is delicious! I give it five stars!

Entry.JapaneseText: おいしいわね……
そうだろう、 そうだろう。
<Green>『<item:2000000A>』のレシピを入手しました。
いつでも 食べさせてあげるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll let you have some whenever you like.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、いつぞやは荷物運びして もらって世話になったね。
Entry.EnglishText: Ohh, you were the ones who helped me move that cargo a while back.

Entry.JapaneseText: お礼にうちのハンバーグを 食べていってくれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Here's some Hamburger Steak, on the house!

Entry.JapaneseText: ただのハンバーグとあなどるなかれ、 当店自慢のハンバーグだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you go thinking it's just any old steak, this here's our signature dish!

Entry.JapaneseText: 誰か探してるのかい？ うちの店には、誰も 来なかったけどな……
Entry.EnglishText: Are you looking for someone? Sorry, but no one came by this store...

Entry.JapaneseText: お昼時以外は見たとおり ガラガラなんだ。 困った事にね……
Entry.EnglishText: As you can see, this place is a ghost town outside of lunch time. It's quite a bother...

Entry.JapaneseText: 客より店員が多いなんて…… トホホ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't believe there're more employees than customers... Ahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、君たち、 荷物運び、ご苦労だったね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, it's you! thanks for helping me carry my luggage back then!

Entry.JapaneseText: 早速、約束の名物料理を……と 言いたいところだけど、 君たち忙しそうだもんね……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd serve you some of my shop's signature Hamburger Steak, but it looks like you guys are busy...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今の用事が済んで落ち着いたら うちの自慢の「ハンバーグ」を 食べに来てくれよな！
Entry.EnglishText: Feel free to come back and have some once you've finished with your work!

Entry.JapaneseText: イライラするのは、 お腹が空いてるせいだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I get angry when I'm on an empty stomach.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、最近のこの街のガジュマには お腹が空いてなくても イライラさせられる……
Entry.EnglishText: However, recently the Gajuma here have been getting on my nerves even when I'm full...

Entry.JapaneseText: 街のあちらこちらで ケンカが頻発してるな。 そのうち大きなのになるぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: Fights have been occurring all over town lately. Things might turn messy...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたんだい、なにか 焦ってるみたいだけど。
Entry.EnglishText: What's wrong? You look like you're in a hurry.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ外出禁止だってさ。 なんだかむかつくな……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm getting pissed off that Huma can't go outside..

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起きてるんだ……？ 海の向こうの方からっぽいな。
Entry.EnglishText: What's going on...? It sounds like it's coming from the ocean...

Entry.JapaneseText: 東大陸の一部が海の中に 沈んだんだってね。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard part of Eastalia sunk into the sea.

Entry.JapaneseText: 住んでた人もみんな 海の底なのかな。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if the people living there also sunk with it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……魚になってたりしてね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Looks like they're sleeping with the fishes now.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか知らないけど、 店員同士の仲はあんまりよくないね。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know why, but it seems like my employees don't get along with each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: もっと楽しくやりたいなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope their relationship gets better...
Entry.Notes: Sounds a little more romantic then I think it should

Entry.JapaneseText: むむぅ……屋内に 追いやられるとは…… ……みじめだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hngg... What a pain... Why did I have to get assigned indoors?

Entry.JapaneseText: うおっ…… 外で何が起きてるんだ!?
まだ揺れてる…… 揺れてる……
ん？ 気のせいか……？
うちの店は万年、 人手不足なんですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: This store's always in need of cashiers, you know?

Entry.JapaneseText: 手伝ってくださる方が いらっしゃればねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: Sure would be better if y'all came here to help us out.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょうどいいところに 来てくれた。 店番してくれないか？
Entry.EnglishText: You've come at a good time. Could you watch the bar for me?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『年代もののピアノ』 触るのはやめておこう。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Vintage Piano - You decided to leave it alone.
